actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to reimburse cooperators for work performed which benefits Forest Service programs.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to include in cooperative agreements between the Forest Service and public or private agencies, organizations, institutions, and persons, arrangements for reinbursement of such cooperators by the Forest Service for the performance of work by them for the benefit of program and activities of the Forest Service.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to reimburse cooperators for work performed which benefits Forest Service programs.
